smg.text: Cold and dry. Mainly cloudy. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Cold and dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 easterly winds.
